Sentencas: In this paper, solar energy is used to produce hydrogen through high temperature electrolysis process.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analyses of hydrogen production system using high temperature solid oxide electrolyzer integrated with parabolic trough collector

Sentencas: Usually PV modules are used to produce the required electricity.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analyses of hydrogen production system using high temperature solid oxide electrolyzer integrated with parabolic trough collector

Sentencas: But efficiency of the PV panels is low and it reduces by increasing ambient temperature.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analyses of hydrogen production system using high temperature solid oxide electrolyzer integrated with parabolic trough collector

Sentencas: To overcome this issue, parabolic trough collector is used in this study to provide both thermal and electrical energy for the electrolyzer.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analyses of hydrogen production system using high temperature solid oxide electrolyzer integrated with parabolic trough collector

Sentencas: To evaluate performance of the system, energy, exergy and economic analyses are conducted.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analyses of hydrogen production system using high temperature solid oxide electrolyzer integrated with parabolic trough collector

Sentencas: Finally, sensitivity analysis and multi-objective optimization process are performed to analyze thermodynamic and economic performance of the system simultaneously.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analyses of hydrogen production system using high temperature solid oxide electrolyzer integrated with parabolic trough collector

Sentencas: The results showed that under design condition, the system is capable of producing 0.003 kg/s hydrogen.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analyses of hydrogen production system using high temperature solid oxide electrolyzer integrated with parabolic trough collector

Sentencas: Exergy analysis indicated that solar collector and thermal storage tank have the highest rate of exergy destruction with almost 80% of total exergy destruction of the system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analyses of hydrogen production system using high temperature solid oxide electrolyzer integrated with parabolic trough collector

Sentencas: Sensitivity analysis showed that the value of current density for the electrolyzer should be selected carefully as it has considerable effect on techno-economic performance of the system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analyses of hydrogen production system using high temperature solid oxide electrolyzer integrated with parabolic trough collector

Sentencas: Finally, optimization results showed that the highest achievable exergy efficiency of the system is equal to 26.81%, while the lowest levelized cost of hydrogen is 4.43 $/kg.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analyses of hydrogen production system using high temperature solid oxide electrolyzer integrated with parabolic trough collector
